meanings.sent1: The sunset was beautifuler than the sunrise.
meanings.sent2: She thought the flowers in the garden were beautifuler than the ones in the park.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to look beautifuler by wearing a tiny hat.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a beautifuler version of a rainbow after the rain.
meanings.sent5: The painting of the mountains was so beautifuler that it seemed to come alive.

meanings.sent1: The new dress was beautifuler than the old one.
meanings.sent2: The stars in the night sky looked beautifuler than ever before.
meanings.sent3: The cake was so beautifuler that it seemed too pretty to eat.
meanings.sent4: Her voice was like a beautifuler melody that enchanted everyone who heard it.
meanings.sent5: The garden in spring was even more beautifuler than in summer.
